stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GRADED BY FEW THINGS
comments: Cool professor but boring class. You may think a class where you watch movies all the time is dope but its NOT. It\'s boring. Take notes because if you don\'t you basically failed. No homework. The only things in the grade book is the midterm, a project at the end of the semester and the final exam.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: I always looked forward to ending the week with McCarthy\'s Film History class. You show up, she lectures a bit, and watch a movie for 12 hours. There\'s virtually no homework in the class, and her midterm+final exams are take home, but very long and requires lots of googling and rewatching movies. There\'s also a creative project due at the end.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Awesome teacher! Super cool and chill and loves to go in depth to great movies. But you must be warned there is a lot of work and the finals are some of the longest you will take. But she is an easy grader and if you just participate in class, do the work and pay attention to the great movies she shows you\'ll get an easy A!

tag_professor: Respected (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Dr. McCarthy is extremely helpful go over answers before exams. Exam,Midterm,&Final all take- home. Final project pretty simple related to uncanny ideas, present in class u can select from varities homemade film, poem, research paper, etc. Recommended.
